message:
And we got finally our website up. so we can post all the Hangouts and there is a plan to post articles and Snippets. If you would like to post an Article please share it with me. We will only accept Quality Articles to keep the same Spirits of our community.

Oh Yeah, Please Share it with your Friends and Tweet it. #EgyptianGeeks
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
